title: Migrant Rape in Germany
author: VD
content_html:
Apparently it’s a crime in Germany to post these statistics. I wonder why? Do you think it’s possible that perhaps the German people don’t want to live around people who are disproportionally disposed to commit rape? Or that if the German people knew the truth, they might decide that perhaps living under the rule of Clown World was much worse than any of the alternatives?

DISCUSS ON SG
